sources.title: Twin Husbands (1933)
sources.description: Twin Husbands (1933) PD - Copyright Not Renewed

sources.title: Twin Husbands
sources.description: * Released: 1933-11-30 BW (Eng USA) * Comedy Thriller * Chesterfield Motion Pictures Corp.; Invincible Picture * Summary: "DUPLICITY" * STARRING: John Miljan (Jerry 1&2), Shirley Grey (Chloe), Monroe Owsley (Colton), Hale Hamilton (Col Gordon), Robert Eliott (Sgt Kerrigan), Wilson Benge (Greyson the Butler), Maurice Black (Feets) * PRODUCER: Maury M. Cohen * DIRECTORS: Frank R. Strayer w Melville Shyer(Assist. Dir) and Edward C. Jewell (Art Dir) * WRITER: Robert Ellis (Orig. Story) * SCREENPLAY CONTINUITY & DIALOGUE: Robert Ellis and Anthony Coldewey * EDITOR: Roland Reed * CINEMATOGRAPHY: M.A. Anderson * SOURCE: The Movie, Wikipedia, and (thank you) "MrFilmschatten" * I own ZERO % OF FILM; for EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES only. Doreen (def gp ddh)

sources.title: Twin Husbands
sources.description: Those who chose John Miljan to impersonate a missing man discover that he is more resourceful than they bargained for.

sources.title: Twin Husbands (1933) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Stars: Shirley Grey, John Miljan, Monroe Owsley 
 Director: Frank R. Strayer

 To obtain valuable bonds, a woman forces a criminal to pose as her spouse.

metadata.Plot: Chesterfield - John Miljan, Shirley Grey, Monroe Owsley, Hale Hamilton. Miljan plays a famous crook who awakens in a posh mansion...
metadata.Actors: John Miljan, Shirley Grey, Monroe Owsley
